mapper.select:
select t1.*, t4.name credit_mall_name, t2.name as student_name, t3.mobile, t5.name verify_staff_name, t6.name school_name from credit_exchange t1 left join student t2 on t2.id = t1.student_id left join user t3 on t3.id = t1.user_id left join credit_mall t4 on t4.id = t1.credit_mall_id left join staff t5 on t5.id = t1.verify_staff left join org t6 on t6.id = t1.school_id
t1.deleted = 0
AND t4.name like concat('%', #{param.giftName}, '%')
AND t4.credit_mall_id = #{param.credit_mall_id}
AND t1.verify_state = #{param.verifyState}
AND ( date(t1.add_time) >= #{param.startDate} and date(t1.add_time) <= #{param.endDate} )
order by t1.id desc
